hymn.title: Who made the world so big and round?

layout.singingstanza: Who made the world so big and round? God, our great Cre -- a -- tor. Who put the flow -- ers in the ground? God, our great Cre -- a -- tor. Who put the stars up in the sky? Who made the lit -- tle birds to fly? No, not I! God, our great Cre -- a -- tor.

lyrics.stanza: Who made the world so big and round? God, our great Creator. Who put the flowers in the ground? God, our great Creator. Who put the stars up in the sky? Who made the little birds to fly? Did you do it? No, not I! God, our great Creator.
